alerts.title: Phishing Alert
alerts.body:
If you receive a suspicious email, it may be part of a fraudulent "phishing" scheme.

Reminder:

Do not click on any links or reply to the email. Simply delete it.

To report a suspicious email that uses Bank of America's name, forward the email to abuse@bankofamerica.com before you delete it.

alerts.title: System Maintenance
alerts.body:
Oops, transactions are currently not up to date.

Please try back later.
